title._content: Image taken from page 14 of 'La Révolution de 1830, 27-28-29 juillet. D'après Gervinus. [An abridged translation of the account in “Geschichte des neunzehnten Jahrhunderts seit den Wiener Verträgen.” With plates.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "La Révolution de 1830, 27-28-29 juillet. D'après Gervinus.
